data.name: Alien maze
data.detailed_description:
（1） Introduction to the game
Alien maze is a puzzle maze exploration game. Players need to use their brains to reach the exit in a limited number of steps.
（2） How to play the game
The game operation uses the keyboard operation to move the way, through the road to reach the end of the maze.
Operation mode
W (up) s (down) a (left) d (right)
Labyrinth road winding twists and turns, a careless will take the wrong road, the difficulty will increase with the increase of levels, use your brain, out of the labyrinth.

data.short_description: Alien maze is a puzzle maze exploration game. Players need to use their brains to reach the exit in a limited number of steps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content。There may be subtle sexual innuendo.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
